Class LyndonWords

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Generators.LyndonWords
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Generator

    public class LyndonWords
extends java.lang.Object
implements Generator
    Class used to generate De Bruijn words by chaining together Lyndon words
